scripts.m: node ./remove-script.js && dotnet ef migrations add first && dotnet ef database drop -f && dotnet ef database update && dotnet watch run
scripts.ci: npm run prod-front && npm run push
scripts.prod: npm run prod-front && npm run prod-back
scripts.init: git init && git remote add origin https://github.com/djm2x/didh.git
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m "commit" && git push -u origin master
scripts.git: npm run f-git-cm && npm run b-git-cm
